result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dustin J. Drone

defendant.name: Drone, Dustin J.
defendant.address: 144 N Clark St, Lone Rock, WI 53556

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Dustin J. Drone
Current: 144 N Clark St, Lone Rock, WI 53556 United States  (Effective: 12-02-2015)
Prior: 144  N. Clark Street, Lone Rock, WI 53556

15CM108 and 15CM109.  Defendant Dustin J. Drone in court with attorney Timothy Luke Angel. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Atty. Angel states that the parties have an agreement for resolution of these matters calling for def's plea for "time served" sentence (55 days jail with 42 days credit) in 15CM109 for dismissal of 15CM108.  Def pleads guilty to the single count of bail jumping in 15CM109.  Court's colloquy on plea.  Finding of guilty.  Court orders 55 days jail with 42 days credit plus costs with 60 dtp.  15CM108 dismissed and read in.

Defendant Dustin J. Drone in court, in custody, with attorney Timothy Luke Angel. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  15CM108 and 15CM109/initial in both.  Formal readings waived.  NG pleas entered.  Atty. Angel asks for reduction of the cash bond amount in 15CM109 (presently at 1k cash).  DA objects.  Court denies request to modify bond.  Status requested and set.  Status conference scheduled for August 5, 2015 at 03:30 pm.
